sentences.en: A conference between persons who are remote from one anotherbut linked together by a telecommunications system.
sentences.cn: 通过电信系统将相互远离的人们联系在一起而实现的一种会议.

sentences.en: A digital switching device in telecommunications for routing lines.
sentences.cn: 电讯中用于线路路由的数字交换装置.

sentences.en: And services such as telecommunications and energy are important inputs for manufacturers.
sentences.cn: 另外对制造商而言,诸如通讯和能源之类的服务是笔很重要的投入.

sentences.en: Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications that Professor Wang.
sentences.cn: 北京邮电大学教授王立新认为.

sentences.en: For instance, in telecommunications, or geology, 3 D data management is needed.
sentences.cn: 比如在远程通讯或者是地质方面就需要3D数据的管理.

sentences.en: Information technology. Telecommunications and information exchange between systems. Private integrated services network.
sentences.cn: 信息技术. 系统间电信和信息交换. 个人集成服务网络.

sentences.en: Minicomputers are often used to control the telecommunications.
sentences.cn: 小型计算机常常用来控制远距离通信.

sentences.en: Most of them are still in IT, telecommunications and consumer products.
sentences.cn: 他们大多数仍然以IT 、 通讯和消费产品为主.

sentences.en: San Diego also has a thriving telecommunications industry and is a center of high - performance computing.
sentences.cn: 圣地亚哥还有一项最兴旺的电信业,它还是高性能计算机业的中心.

sentences.en: Telecommunications through voice, data, and image communication is changing the world.
sentences.cn: 电信通过语音, 数据和图像通信正在改变着世界.

sentences.en: The deal is expected to result in similar tie-ups between big media companies and telecommunications operators.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易可能促成大型传媒公司和电信运营商结成类似的联营关系。

sentences.en: The news gave a fillip to the telecommunications sector.
sentences.cn: 这个消息给电信部门注入了一针强心剂。

sentences.en: The television screens of the next century will be linked up to an emerging world telecommunications grid.
sentences.cn: 下个世纪的电视屏幕将会接入到正在形成的全球电信网络中。

sentences.en: To ensure long - term growth, railway, aviation, finance, telecommunications monopoly must be broken.
sentences.cn: 要保证 长期 的增长, 铁路 、 航空 、 金融 、 电信的垄断都要打破.

trans.tran_cn: [电]电通信，电信，通讯，电信学，电讯
trans.tran_en: the sending and receiving of messages by telephone, radio, television etc
